thread.title: Yu

author: Yu
title: Yu
text: Package was never delivered, DHL customer service is so rude, lady yelled at me over the phone and told me we don't know where is ur package, maybe try your neighbors!!! Call company customer service lane, lady was terrible, don't speak English and did not follow up at all!! Finally I figered out by myself, and went to a different town under same address to looking for my package!!! You tell me how good my experience is with all the drama!!
